mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.psychologyer_name as psychologyerName ,a.psychologyer_phone as psychologyerPhone ,a.psychologyer_photo as psychologyerPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.psychologyer_email as psychologyerEmail ,a.psychologyer_shanchang as psychologyerShanchang ,a.psychologyer_lvli as psychologyerLvli ,a.psychologyer_content as psychologyerContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM psychologyer a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.psychologyer_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.psychologyerName},'%')
and a.psychologyer_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.psychologyerPhone},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.psychologyer_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.psychologyerEmail},'%')
and a.psychologyer_shanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.psychologyerShanchang},'%')
and a.psychologyer_lvli like CONCAT('%',#{params.psychologyerLvli},'%')
and a.psychologyer_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.psychologyerContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
